name: Twisty Puzzle World
description:
Twisty Puzzle World contains 400+ twisty / magic puzzles. In addition you can create new puzzles with the ingame editor to give you limitless possibilities.

The editor has many options like:
- choose shape/3d-model/voxel-shape
- choose symmetry (like cube, dodecahedron, icosahedron and dihedral)
- move or rotate the shape
- apply cutting planes
- change colors of the stickers
- apply pictures on the stickers (add your own pictures to any puzzle)
- bandage cubies
